sneckomod:SneckoSoul.NAME: Snecko Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #ySoul #yRoll to your hand.

sneckomod:SuperSneckoSoul.NAME: Super Snecko Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#407B93]Snecko [#407B93]Soul[]. NL At the start of each combat and every other turn, gain a #ySoul #yRoll [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL On other turns, draws an additional card at the start of your turn and #ysneckomod:Muddles it.

sneckomod:CleanMud.NAME: Snake-Charmer's Flute
DESCRIPTIONS: #ysneckomod:Muddled cards can't cost #b3 [REMOVE_SPACE].

sneckomod:ConfusingCodex.NAME: Ring of the Snek
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you activate #b3 #ysneckomod:Overflow effects, apply #b1 #yWeak and #yVulnerable to a random enemy.

sneckomod:CrystallizedMud.NAME: Mesmerising Pendant
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. #ysneckomod:Muddled cards can't cost #b0.

sneckomod:LoadedDie.NAME: Loaded Die
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card is #ysneckomod:Muddled, gain #b1 #yBlock [REMOVE_SPACE].

sneckomod:RareBoosterPack.NAME: Rare Booster Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain an #ysneckomod:Offclass #yRare card.

sneckomod:SleevedAce.NAME: Sleeved Ace
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain a #yMarked #yCard [REMOVE_SPACE].

sneckomod:UnknownEgg.NAME: Unidentified Egg
sneckomod:UnknownEgg.FLAVOR: What will hatch? Pay $1000 to see.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add an #ysneckomod:Offclass card to your deck, #yUpgrade it. Upon pickup, #yUpgrade #b2 random #ysneckomod:Offclass cards.

sneckomod:SuperSneckoEye.NAME: Super Snecko Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #ySnecko #yEye. At the start of your turn, draw #b4 additional cards. Start each combat #yConfused.

sneckomod:SneckoTalon.NAME: Idol of Retromation
sneckomod:SneckoTalon.FLAVOR: Often called the Idol of Reto for short.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, reduce the cost of a random card that costs at least #b1 in your hand by #b1 for this turn.

sneckomod:BlankCard.NAME: Blank Card
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add an #ygremlin:Echo of a random #rnon-Curse [REMOVE_SPACE], #ynon-Status card from your deck to your hand. It costs #b0 [REMOVE_SPACE].

sneckomod:D8.NAME: Mystical Octahedron
sneckomod:D8.FLAVOR: It appears weighted toward one side.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card that has an #ysneckomod:Overflow effect. Whenever you play it, gain #b4 #yBlock and activate its #yOverflow effect, even if you don't have more than #b5 cards in hand.

is played, gain #b4 #yBlock and activate its #ysneckomod:Overflow effect, even if you don't have more than #b5 cards in hand.

sneckomod:BabySnecko.NAME: Young Snecko
DESCRIPTIONS: Deals #b9 damage to a random enemy and #ysneckomod:Muddles #b2 random (not #b0 cost, #bX [REMOVE_SPACE], or #yUnplayable [REMOVE_SPACE]) cards in your hand at the start of your turn.

sneckomod:SneckoCommon.NAME: Seal of Approval
sneckomod:SneckoCommon.FLAVOR: I'm The Ironclad and this is my favorite Relic in the Spire.  -Merchant Advertising Pamphlet
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose #b1 of #b5 Uncommon #ysneckomod:Offclass #yPowers to obtain.

sneckomod:SneckoBoss.NAME: Lucky Horseshoe
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose #b1 of #b3 #yCharacters [REMOVE_SPACE]. Choose #b3 #yUpgraded Uncommon cards and #b2 Rare cards to add to your deck. All combats drop an additional card reward of the chosen character's cards.
Upon pickup, obtain #b3 Upgraded Uncommon and #b2 Rare
cards. All combats drop an additional
card reward.
